pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyinlineA function inliner for Python. Import `inline` from `pyinline` and run:```console$ python -m pyinline source.py```This will convert the following:```pythonfrom pyinline import inlineimport logginglog = logging.getLogger(__name__)@inlinedef log_error(msg: str, exception: Exception): log.error(msg, exception, exc_info=True)try: x = 1 / 0except Exception as e: log_error("Could not divide number", e)```will generate:```pythonimport logginglog = logging.getLogger(__name__)try: x = 1 / 0except Exception as e: log.error("Could not divide number", e, exc_info=True)```Call with `--diff` to generate a patch.
